title: Japanese Crab Noodle Salad
ingredients: ['120g instant noodles', 'For the sauce', '1/2 tablespoon mirin (sweet cooking Japanese rice wine)', '1 tablespoon wine vinegar', '1 teaspoon balsamic vinegar', '1 tablespoon sugar', '1/2 tablespoon sesame oil', '1 or 2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 teaspoon chilli paste', 'For the salad', '50g crab meat, broken up', '100g freshly cooked octopus or squid rings (optional)', '1/2 cucumber, thinly sliced', '50g bean sprouts', '1/2 red pepper, sliced into rings', '2 scallions, sliced', 'sprinkling sushi nori (toasted seaweed)']
